attributes.action: Send a humatarian aid and fire fighting planes to Turkey to help wild fires
attributes.additional_details: Turkey helped us during covid by sending masks and ppe for nurses and health care staff so it’s a good change to return the favour
attributes.background: To send urgent help to Turkey to stop wild fires burning forest and creating disaster

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
